rules.title: Keep domain module pure
rules.description: Domain module must not depend on Spring, JPA, Web, or infrastructure packages.
rules.rationale: Framework coupling reduces testability and flexibility.

rules.title: Do not log PII
rules.description: Never log phone numbers, emails, addresses, tokens, or authorization headers.
rules.rationale: PII leakage creates security and compliance risks.

rules.title: External calls must define timeouts
rules.description: All outbound HTTP/GRPC calls must explicitly configure timeouts.
rules.rationale: Missing timeouts can exhaust threads and resources.
